sentences.en: ‘I won’t be able to come into work tomorrow.’ ‘Why not?’
sentences.cn: “我明天不能来上班。”“为什么？”

sentences.en: ‘She wants to meet you.’ ‘Why?’
sentences.cn: “她想认识你。”“为什么？”

sentences.en: "Why didn't you appoint Ron twelve months ago?"—"Good question."
sentences.cn: “你为什么12个月前不任命罗恩呢？”——“问得好。”

sentences.en: And I thought to myself, why, I can do that.
sentences.cn: 我就对自己说，嗨，我能行的。

sentences.en: He wonders why the digits on his calculator slope to the right.
sentences.cn: 他不明白为什么他的计算器上面的数字向右倾斜。

sentences.en: He’s angry with me and I don’t know why.
sentences.cn: 他生我气了，我不知道为什么。

sentences.en: I don't know why he bothers me with this kind of rubbish.
sentences.cn: 我不明白他为何用这种烂事来烦我。

sentences.en: I have no idea why the television isn’t working.
sentences.cn: 我不明白电视机为什么坏了。

sentences.en: I've been wondering if you yourselves have any idea why she came.
sentences.cn: 我一直在想，你们自己是否知道她为什么来。

sentences.en: She asked them why they hadn't turned the lights on.
sentences.cn: 她问他们为什么不开灯。

sentences.en: Simon loves you – that’s why he wants to be with you.
sentences.cn: 西蒙爱你——所以他想和你在一起。

sentences.en: That's why I must trust you to keep this secret.
sentences.cn: 那就是为什么我必须得相信你会保守这个秘密的原因。

sentences.en: There’s no reason why we shouldn’t be friends.
sentences.cn: 我们没有理由不成为朋友。

sentences.en: Why are Geography, Drama, Art and English in the ascendant?
sentences.cn: 为什么地理、戏剧、艺术和英语逐渐受宠？

sentences.en: Why are you crying?
sentences.cn: 你为什么哭？

sentences.en: Why couldn't he ever rid himself of those thoughts, those worries?
sentences.cn: 为什么他总是无法摆脱那些想法和担忧？

sentences.en: Why do we have to take all these tests?
sentences.cn: 我们为什么一定要参加这些测验？

sentences.en: Why don't you and I go away this weekend?
sentences.cn: 不如咱俩这个周末出去度假吧？

sentences.en: Why don't you stay here and keep Emma company?
sentences.cn: 你为什么不呆在这儿，陪陪埃玛？

sentences.en: Why not retrain for a job which will make you happier?
sentences.cn: 为什么不接受新的培训，找一份让你更快乐的工作？

sentences.en: Why should a great community like a university be afraid of nihilism?
sentences.cn: 为什么像大学这样人才济济的社区要害怕虚无主义呢？

sentences.en: Why should they get first call on the best property?
sentences.cn: 凭什么最好的房产尽着他们先挑？

sentences.en: Why were grown-ups always so stuffy and slow to recognize good ideas?
sentences.cn: 为什么成年人总是那么一本正经，对好点子反应那么迟缓呢？

sentences.en: Why, look who’s here!
sentences.cn: 哎呀，看看这是谁！

sentences.en: You flatter yourself. Why would we go to such ludicrous lengths?
sentences.cn: 你真自以为是。我们为什么要费那么大的力气？

trans.tran_en: used to ask or talk about the reason for something
used when you are surprised or have suddenly realized something

trans.tran_cn: 哎呀，嗨〔表示惊讶或突然意识到某事〕
